page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = CreatePrivateKey(KeyFileName as C [, Bits = 512 as N [,Password as C]])

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

argument.name: KeyFileName
argument.description: The path and name of the private key file.

argument.name: Password
argument.description: Optional. Default = "". The password for the private key file.

page.description: Create a private key with an optional password and write to KeyFileName Note: Bits must be one of 512, 1024 or 2048
page.discussion: The INET::SSLContext::CreatePrivateKey() method creates a private key with an optional password.
page.example: dim ctx as INET::SSLContext if ctx.createprivatekey(FileName, Bits, Password) then ResultText = "Creation of key was successful" else ResultText = "Error creating key: " + ctx.callresult.text end if ui_msg_box("Create Private Key: " + FileName, ResultText)
